definitions.meaning:
[sing]交易；买卖；交易量
business or trade, or the amount of trade in a particular type of goods

examples.content:
the world market in coffee
世界咖啡交易

They have increased their share of the market by 10%.
他们将其所占的市场份额增加了 10%。

definitions.meaning:
[c]商品的销售地；行销地区；消费群体
a particular area, country or section of the population that might buy goods

examples.content:
the Japanese market
日本市场

the global/domestic market
全球╱国内销售市场

definitions.meaning:
[sing]~ (for sth)（顾客对货物或服务的）需求
the number of people who want to buy sth

examples.content:
a growing/declining market for second-hand cars
不断扩大的╱萎缩的二手车市场

definitions.meaning:
[sing]（处于竞争中的）市场经营者，市场
people who buy and sell goods in competition with each other

examples.content:
The market will decide if the TV station has any future.
电视台是否有前途将取决于市场。

a market-based/market-driven/market-led economy
以市场为基础的╱市场推动的╱市场引导的经济

It is marketed as a low-alcohol wine.
它作为一种低度酒投放市场。

School meals need to be marketed to children in the same way as other food.
校餐也要以其他食品的推销方法推销给孩子。
